title: Schedule
name: Schedule
description:
Provides a programmatic interface to the scheduling engine. You can run a specified
  page at scheduled intervals with the option to write out static HTML pages. This lets you offer users
  access to pages that publish data, such as reports, without forcing users to wait while a database transaction
  is performed in order to populate the data on the page.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description:
- delete: deletes the specified task
- update: updates an existing task or creates a new task, if one with the name specified by the task attribute does not exist
- run: executes the specified task
- list: list all scheduled tasks defined
- pause: pause execution of the defined scheduled task
- resume: resume execution of a paused scheduled task

attributes.name: serverpassword
attributes.description: allow you to access filesystem, also when access is denied for your context

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: if set to true the scheduled task is not displayed in the Lucee Administrator.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: if set to true the scheduled task can not be modified or deleted in the Lucee Administrator.

attributes.name: task
attributes.description: The name of the task to delete, update, or run.

attributes.name: operation
attributes.description: The type of operation the scheduler performs when executing this task.

attributes.name: paused
attributes.description: if set to true the scheduled task is paused.

attributes.name: file
attributes.description: Required with publish ='Yes' A valid filename for the published file.

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: Required with publish ='Yes' The path location for the published file.

attributes.name: startDate
attributes.description: Required when action ='update'. The date when scheduling of the task should start.

attributes.name: startTime
attributes.description:
Required when creating tasks with action = 'update'. Enter a value in seconds. The time when
	scheduling of the task starts.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Required when action = 'update'. The URL to be executed.

attributes.name: publish
attributes.description: Specifies whether the result should be saved to a file.

attributes.name: endDate
attributes.description: The date when the scheduled task ends.

attributes.name: endTime
attributes.description: The time when the scheduled task ends. Enter a value in seconds.

attributes.name: interval
attributes.description:
Required when creating tasks with action = 'update'. Interval at which task should be scheduled.
		Can be set in seconds or as Once, Daily, Weekly, and Monthly. The default interval is one hour. The
		minimum interval is one minute.

attributes.name: requestTimeOut
attributes.description:
Customizes the requestTimeOut for the task operation. Can be used to extend the default timeout
		for operations that require more time to execute.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: Username if URL is protected.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: Password if URL is protected.

attributes.name: proxyServer
attributes.description: Host name or IP address of a proxy server.

attributes.name: proxyUser
attributes.description: User name to provide to the proxy server.

attributes.name: proxyPassword
attributes.description: Password to provide to the proxy server.

attributes.name: resolveURL
attributes.description: Specifies whether to resolve links in the result page to absolute references.

attributes.name: port
attributes.description:
The port number on the server from which the task is being scheduled. Default is 80. When used
		with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically resolved
		to preserve links in the retrieved document.

attributes.name: proxyPort
attributes.description:
The port number on the proxy server from which the task is being requested. Default is 80. When
		used with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically
		resolved to preserve links in the retrieved document.

attributes.name: returnvariable
attributes.description: return variable name of action list

attributes.name: autoDelete
attributes.description: if set to true, the scheduled task get deleted when there is no possible future execution.
